title: Cautious Business Acquaintance
description: We maintain a reserved professional relationship characterized by moderate trust (32.1/100) but minimal interaction strength (0/100). As the Consiglio, I recognize Lucia Zanchi's transformation from porter to logistics entrepreneur, particularly her warehouse network connecting Venice's five public docks, while she likely views my authority with appropriate deference but limited personal connection. Our interactions remain formal and transaction-focused, with potential for development through addressing mutual business interests in warehouse operations and commercial logistics.
